name: Sweet Dream Shelter
description:
Short surreal game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 152 The theme for this Jam was "Shelter", this is the game i made in two days

-Plot-

Anturio when seeing that the library is closed decided to go home but on the way a strange gum machine starts to move and guides him inside a house that turns out to be a strange refuge for a girl named Dandalia

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame
